casebody.data:
Second Department,

April, 1955.

(April 4, 1955.) Hazel F. Bittson, Respondent, v. Peggy Equities Corp., Appellant.

In an action to recover the amount of a loan, order directing examination before trial of appellant, by its president, affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements; examination to proceed on ten days’ notice. No opinion. Nolan, P. J., Wenzel, Schmidt, Beldock and Murphy, JJ., concur.
